reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Sostegno alla Realizzazione del Censimento dell’Agricoltura 2021

description.narrative: Questa iniziativa mira a contribuire alla realizzazione del Censimento agricolo per il 2021 in Palestina. Più precisamente, essa intende sia sostenere i costi economici che il Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics deve sostenere per la raccolta dati in tutto il territorio, sia garantire che l’istituzione palestinese possa con efficacia elaborare la metodologia d’intervento, l'analisi e la disseminazione delle informazioni. La presente proposta rafforza competenze e capacità delle istituzioni palestinesi nell’ambito dell’agricoltura e concorre alla produzione di dati necessari all’elaborazione di strategie e politiche, sia dal lato palestinese sia da quello dei donatori bilaterali e multilaterali.

This initiative supports the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics in designing and conducting the Agricultural Census for 2021 in Palestine. It will cover for the operational costs related to the Agricultural Census as well as for the development of the methodology. This project proposal will contribute to strengthening the capacity and competencies of the Palestinian institutions in the domain of agriculture and to build an exhaustive dataset that will better inform the policy-makers’ decisions, for both the Palestinian institutions and the donors.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts

By 2030, build on existing initiatives to develop measurements of progress on sustainable development that complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity-building in developing countries
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
